name: survive in the hole
description:
controls

z= interact, buy and craft

x= pick up object

crafts

stick+stick=fireplace

stick+stone=hamer

hamer+stone=fire

hamer+stone+fireplace=fireplace on

hamer+tree = wood block and sticks

interact+tree =  sticks

wolfs are dangers and destroy wood blocks

werewolfs dont exist , or no?

when the player dies the game should close, but because it is html an error occurs and continues normally, which should not happen

if I continue this game, it will probably become a roguelite game
